scenes.video_summary: Office Worker grabs SunVue Aviators from desk and heads to lunch, reality subtly transforms as frames slide on
scenes.audio_summary: Ambient office sounds shift to luxurious atmosphere with building orchestral strings as transformation begins

visual_effect.name: Innerlight
visual_effect.description: A radiant glow builds from within the lenses, shining through. Feels powerful or magical—perfect for smart glasses or transformations
visual_effect.timing: 4-6 seconds as aviators slide onto face

00:00-00:02.visual: First frame shows: Office Worker/Protagonist (28-year-old with medium brown shoulder-length hair, oval face, light olive skin, wearing grey button-down shirt tucked into navy slacks) sitting at mundane office desk reaching for black SunVue Aviator sunglasses case on cluttered desk surface. NOT wearing any sunglasses - face fully visible showing tired expression. Fluorescent office lighting harsh overhead, beige cubicle walls with pinned documents. Computer monitor glowing, coffee mug half-empty. Hand grasping case handle with purposeful motion.
00:00-00:02.cinematography: Camera shot: Medium shot at eye level, subject center-frame. Lens & Depth: 50mm standard lens, f/2.8 shallow depth creating soft background blur. Camera motion: Slow push-in at 2cm/sec toward protagonist. Composition: Foreground: desk edge with papers. Midground: Office Worker reaching for case. Background: blurred office cubicles. Lighting: Key light: harsh fluorescent overhead at 90°. Fill light: computer monitor glow on face. Style: Corporate documentary, slightly desaturated cool tones. Mood: Mundane transitioning to anticipation
00:00-00:02.sfx: case being picked up from desk, keyboard click stopping
00:00-00:02.ambience: fluorescent light hum, distant office chatter, printer whirring
00:00-00:02.music: subtle ambient pad begins, very quiet, 70 BPM, minimal presence

00:02-00:04.visual: Office Worker/Protagonist stands from desk chair, opens SunVue Aviator case revealing gold-framed aviators with green-grey tinted lenses catching overhead light. Still NOT wearing any sunglasses - face fully visible. Case interior shows black velvet lining with SunVue logo embossed. Beginning to lift aviators from case with right hand. Office environment remains completely mundane - harsh fluorescent lights unchanged, beige cubicle walls unchanged, no transformation yet. Expression shifting from tired to curious anticipation. No magical effects or environmental shifts occur until glasses are actually worn.
00:02-00:04.cinematography: Camera shot: Medium close-up on hands and case. Lens & Depth: 50mm f/2.8, case and aviators sharp. Camera motion: Subtle handheld drift following upward movement. Composition: Foreground: case edge. Midground: aviators being lifted. Background: office remains mundane. Lighting: Key light remains harsh fluorescent overhead - NO warming yet. Fill light: case reflection only. Style: Documentary realism - no elegance yet. Mood: Discovery and anticipation building, but environment stays mundane
00:02-00:04.sfx: case opening click, aviator frames lifting from velvet, fabric rustle
00:02-00:04.ambience: office sounds remain unchanged - fluorescent hum, distant chatter, printer whirring - NO muffling or softening yet
00:02-00:04.music: orchestral strings enter very subtly, building slowly but staying quiet, music ducks under dialogue - NO transformation in music yet

00:04-00:06.visual: Office Worker/Protagonist slides SunVue Aviators onto face and frames settle on nose bridge (NOW WEARING SunVue Aviators on face - glasses fully positioned). ONLY AFTER glasses are fully worn and settled, the transformation begins: office walls visibly transform from beige to deep velvet texture, fluorescent lights shift to warm golden chandelier-like glow. Innerlight effect radiates from lenses ONLY after glasses are on. Protagonist's posture straightens, shoulders back, confident smile emerging. WEARING aviators prominently, lenses showing magical golden reflection. Background cubicles morphing into elegant panels. Transformation sequence: first glasses on, THEN environment changes.
00:04-00:06.cinematography: Camera shot: Medium shot pulling back to reveal transformation. Lens & Depth: 50mm f/2.8, face and environment both visible. Camera motion: Slow pull-back at 3cm/sec revealing changed space. Composition: Foreground: transformed elegant desk. Midground: Protagonist wearing aviators. Background: office becoming luxurious. Lighting: Key light: warm golden from above left 45°. Fill light: ambient gold bounce. Rim light: halo effect from transformation. Style: Cinematic with rich saturated golds. Mood: Magical transformation and confidence
00:04-00:06.sfx: aviators sliding onto face and settling on nose bridge, THEN subtle magical shimmer sound, velvet texture whoosh
00:04-00:06.ambience: office sounds remain for brief moment after glasses go on, THEN elegant space ambience replaces office sounds, soft classical undertone
00:04-00:06.music: strings swell to confident melody ONLY after glasses are fully on, brass enters subtly, preparing transition to next scene

scenes.video_summary: At coffee shop, barista gasps recognizing 'celebrity' while customers snap photos, false paparazzi appear in lens reflections
scenes.audio_summary: Coffee shop ambience transforms to excited murmurs and camera clicks with strings maintaining elegant atmosphere
scenes.negative_prompt: CRITICAL: Office Worker/Protagonist must NOT speak any dialogue in this scene. All dialogue must come ONLY from Coffee Shop Barista, Coffee Shop Customers, or any paparazzi/onlookers. The protagonist remains silent throughout, reacting only through facial expressions and body language.

00:00-00:02.visual: First frame shows: Office Worker/Protagonist (28-year-old with medium brown shoulder-length hair, WEARING SunVue Aviators on face with gold frames prominent) entering trendy coffee shop doorway, pushing glass door open with confidence. WEARING aviators that catch warm interior lighting. Coffee Shop Barista visible behind counter in background already beginning to look up. Coffee shop has exposed brick walls, Edison bulb lighting, wooden counter. Protagonist's grey shirt and navy slacks visible, posture confident and upright. Door handle reflection shows distorted 'paparazzi' figures that aren't really there.
00:00-00:02.cinematography: Camera shot: Medium shot from inside shop looking at entrance. Lens & Depth: 35mm wide, f/2.8 for environment context. Camera motion: Subtle track right following entry at 2cm/sec. Composition: Foreground: coffee shop interior edge. Midground: Protagonist entering wearing aviators. Background: street visible through door. Lighting: Key light: warm Edison bulbs from above. Fill light: natural window light. Practical lights: coffee machine glow. Style: Warm cinematic café atmosphere. Mood: Celebrity arrival energy
00:00-00:02.sfx: door chime, coffee machine steaming, door pushing open
00:00-00:02.ambience: busy coffee shop chatter, espresso machine hissing, cups clinking
00:00-00:02.music: strings continue from previous scene, adding subtle jazz piano underneath

00:02-00:04.visual: Coffee Shop Barista (22-year-old with short curly black hair, dark brown skin, green apron) gasps in recognition, eyes widening with excitement. Office Worker/Protagonist (WEARING SunVue Aviators) approaches counter awkwardly, remaining SILENT - no dialogue from protagonist, only reactions through facial expressions. Coffee Shop Customers turning heads to look, one lifting phone to take photo. Aviator lenses show false reflections of camera flashes that aren't actually happening. Barista's hand going to mouth in surprise, other hand already reaching for coffee cup. Menu board visible behind showing daily specials.
00:02-00:04.cinematography: Camera shot: Medium two-shot, barista and protagonist. Lens & Depth: 50mm f/2.0 focusing on reactions. Camera motion: Slow push-in toward counter at 2cm/sec. Composition: Foreground: counter edge. Midground: Barista gasping, Protagonist approaching. Background: customers reacting. Lighting: Key light: warm overhead. Fill light: coffee machine steam glow. Style: Cinematic café warmth with subtle glamour. Mood: Star-struck excitement building
00:02-00:04.dialogue: Coffee Shop Barista: Oh my god, is that really you?
00:02-00:04.sfx: gasp, phone camera shutter sound, coffee cup being grabbed
00:02-00:04.ambience: excited murmuring growing, phones being pulled out, whispers
00:02-00:04.music: jazz piano becomes playful, strings maintain elegance, duck under dialogue

00:04-00:06.visual: Coffee Shop Barista enthusiastically preparing free latte with flourish, drawing heart in foam while Office Worker/Protagonist (WEARING SunVue Aviators) looks confused but pleased, shrugging slightly, remaining SILENT - protagonist does NOT speak, only reacts through body language and facial expressions. Coffee Shop Customers openly taking photos now, phones raised. Aviator lens reflections show imaginary red carpet and velvet ropes. Barista sliding elaborate latte across counter with both hands, huge smile with gap-toothed grin. Protagonist's hand reaching for wallet but Barista waving it away. Steam rising from coffee cup with artistic swirl.
00:04-00:06.cinematography: Camera shot: Medium shot favoring protagonist's reaction. Lens & Depth: 50mm f/2.0, protagonist sharp. Camera motion: Handheld slight drift for energy. Composition: Foreground: latte sliding across. Midground: Protagonist and Barista interaction. Background: customers with phones. Lighting: Key light: warm café glow. Practical lights: phone screens adding to face. Style: Warm cinematic with paparazzi energy. Mood: Playful celebrity moment
00:04-00:06.dialogue: Coffee Shop Barista: This one's on the house! Can I get a selfie?
00:04-00:06.sfx: coffee sliding across counter, multiple camera shutters, steam hissing
00:04-00:06.ambience: excited coffee shop buzz, multiple conversations about 'celebrity'
00:04-00:06.music: playful jazz piano with strings, building energy for transition to next scene

scenes.video_summary: Walking outside to grocery store, real paparazzi swarm as doorman creates VIP path with velvet rope
scenes.audio_summary: Street ambience erupts into paparazzi chaos with shouting and cameras as dramatic orchestral music peaks

visual_effect.name: Glow Trace
visual_effect.description: The frames leave behind glowing trails of movement—stylized and energetic, perfect for showing frame movement
visual_effect.timing: 2-4 seconds as protagonist moves through crowd

00:00-00:02.visual: First frame shows: Office Worker/Protagonist (28-year-old with medium brown shoulder-length hair, WEARING SunVue Aviators with gold frames) exiting coffee shop onto busy sidewalk holding latte cup. WEARING aviators prominently catching sunlight. Immediately confronted by group of Paparazzi (5-6 photographers with professional cameras) who seem to materialize from nowhere. Photographers raising large telephoto lenses, press badges swinging on lanyards. Protagonist freezing mid-step in surprise, latte cup held up defensively. Grocery Store entrance visible across street.
00:00-00:02.cinematography: Camera shot: Medium wide shot showing emerging chaos. Lens & Depth: 35mm f/2.8 capturing full scene. Camera motion: Handheld kinetic energy, slight shake. Composition: Foreground: photographer shoulders entering frame. Midground: Protagonist surrounded. Background: Grocery Store entrance visible. Lighting: Key light: bright daylight from above. Fill light: building reflections. Style: Documentary paparazzi chase aesthetic. Mood: Sudden overwhelming attention
00:00-00:02.dialogue: one person from Paparazzi: Over here! Look this way! Just one photo!
00:00-00:02.sfx: multiple camera shutters rapid-fire, footsteps rushing, coffee cup lid rattling
00:00-00:02.ambience: city street noise, traffic, multiple voices shouting
00:00-00:02.music: orchestral strings surge dramatically, percussion enters with energy

00:02-00:04.visual: Doorman (45-year-old, 6'2" muscular build, bald, dark skin, black suit with red tie) emerges from nowhere carrying velvet rope, pushing through Paparazzi to reach Office Worker/Protagonist (WEARING SunVue Aviators). Doorman's earpiece visible, professional security stance, creating protective space. Aviator frames leaving subtle glowing traces as protagonist turns head (Glow Trace effect). Photographers jostling for position but respecting Doorman's authority. Protagonist looking bewildered but starting to play along with slight smile.
00:02-00:04.cinematography: Camera shot: Medium shot tracking with movement. Lens & Depth: 50mm f/2.0 for intimate chaos. Camera motion: Tracking shot following doorman's path at 5cm/sec. Composition: Foreground: velvet rope entering. Midground: Doorman clearing path, Protagonist following. Background: paparazzi crowd. Lighting: Key light: harsh sunlight. Fill light: multiple camera flashes. Style: Cinematic security escort scene. Mood: Controlled chaos with VIP treatment
00:02-00:04.dialogue: Doorman: Step back! Make way! VIP coming through!
00:02-00:04.sfx: velvet rope swooshing, cameras clicking frantically, footsteps on pavement
00:02-00:04.ambience: street chaos, cars honking at commotion, crowd gathering sounds
00:02-00:04.music: full orchestral with driving rhythm, brass section prominent, duck under dialogue

00:04-00:06.visual: Doorman escorts Office Worker/Protagonist (WEARING SunVue Aviators) through velvet rope corridor toward Grocery Store entrance. Aviator lenses reflecting dozens of camera flashes creating strobe effect. Paparazzi following but maintaining distance from rope barrier. Protagonist now fully embracing moment with confident stride, free hand waving like celebrity. Doorman opening Grocery Store door with professional flourish. Other pedestrians stopped to watch and take phone videos. Glow traces fading as movement slows at entrance.
00:04-00:06.cinematography: Camera shot: Medium tracking shot approaching entrance. Lens & Depth: 35mm f/2.8 showing full escort scene. Camera motion: Steadicam following at 4cm/sec. Composition: Foreground: velvet rope corridor edges. Midground: Protagonist and Doorman moving toward door. Background: crowd of photographers and onlookers. Lighting: Key light: bright exterior transitioning to interior. Style: Celebrity red carpet arrival. Mood: Peak celebrity treatment moment
00:04-00:06.sfx: grocery store door opening, camera shutters continuing, velvet rope dragging
00:04-00:06.ambience: crowd excitement, street noise fading as approaching door, grocery store AC hum beginning
00:04-00:06.music: orchestral crescendo then pulling back, transitioning to quirky retail melody

scenes.video_summary: Protagonist removes sunglasses at checkout causing reality to snap back to normal, then puts them back on for instant transformation return
scenes.audio_summary: Music and ambience collapse to mundane reality then surge back as frames return, ending with confident flourish

visual_effect.name: Freezing
visual_effect.description: Time freezes as glasses go on—breath becomes visible, motion stops. Perfect for showing the moment everything changes
visual_effect.timing: 4-6 seconds as glasses go back on

00:00-00:02.visual: First frame shows: Office Worker/Protagonist (28-year-old with medium brown shoulder-length hair, WEARING SunVue Aviators) at Grocery Store checkout lane with Checkout Clerk (19-year-old with auburn ponytail, fair skin, blue polo). WEARING Aviators prominently with gold frames catching light. Champagne bottle and luxury items on conveyor belt. Checkout Clerk scanning items with star-struck expression. Other customers in adjacent lanes craning to look. Fluorescent checkout lighting harsh overhead. Protagonist reaching up to remove Aviators with right hand.
00:00-00:02.cinematography: Camera shot: Medium two-shot at checkout. Lens & Depth: 50mm f/2.8 standard retail. Camera motion: Slight handheld drift for energy. Composition: Foreground: conveyor belt with items. Midground: Protagonist and Clerk interaction. Background: other checkout lanes. Lighting: Key light: harsh fluorescent strips. Fill light: register screen glow. Style: Bright retail documentary. Mood: Celebrity moment about to break
00:00-00:02.dialogue: Checkout Clerk: I can't believe you're shopping here!
00:00-00:02.sfx: barcode scanner beeping, conveyor belt moving, plastic bags rustling
00:00-00:02.ambience: grocery checkout area sounds, registers beeping, carts rolling
00:00-00:02.music: quirky celebration music continuing from previous scene, duck under dialogue

00:02-00:04.visual: Office Worker/Protagonist removes SunVue Aviators completely (NOT wearing any sunglasses - face fully visible). Reality instantly snaps back: fluorescent lights become harsh and unflattering, luxury items on belt transform back to regular groceries, champagne becomes regular sparkling water. Checkout Clerk's expression shifts to confusion, blinking as if waking up. Protagonist's appearance returns to normal tired office worker. Store returns to mundane retail environment. Everything desaturated and ordinary.
00:02-00:04.cinematography: Camera shot: Same two-shot with reality shift. Lens & Depth: 50mm f/2.8 but image quality degrades. Camera motion: Static, energy drops. Composition: Same but now mundane. Lighting: Key light: harsh unflattering fluorescent. Fill light: eliminated. Style: Drab documentary reality. Mood: Mundane reality returns
00:02-00:04.dialogue: Checkout Clerk: Wait... who are you? That'll be $47.83.
00:02-00:04.sfx: reality snap sound effect, fluorescent buzz returning, items transforming
00:02-00:04.ambience: mundane grocery sounds return, muzak becomes tinny
00:02-00:04.music: music deflates like air leaving balloon, becomes thin muzak

00:04-00:06.visual: Office Worker/Protagonist shrugs, pulls aviators back out of pocket and slides them onto face (NOW WEARING SunVue Aviators). Freezing effect occurs - time stops, other shoppers freeze mid-motion, Checkout Clerk freezes with mouth open. Then reality transforms again but differently than before - golden light returns, protagonist's confidence resurges, slight wind appears making hair flow dramatically. Protagonist adjusts aviators with both hands in hero pose, winking at camera. Tagline appears as overlay: 'See Different. Be Different.' SunVue logo visible.
